title: Can't launch game
body: For the last half year or so I have not been able to launch the game from the launcher. I open League up and click the orange launch button and it turns grey for about 4-5 seconds then turns orange again and doesn't start the game. I have tried to reinstall the game and even delete certain client folders and then update the game afterwords but nothing has worked. Anyone have any idea how I could resolve this issue?

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to the login server may be dropping off before a proper connection can be established. Far often than not, this is a result of local network settings that don't play nicely with League. I recommend taking the first step of working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are good.

Let me know if this issue persists through those changes.

Hi. This just started happening to me after the "Yorick update" patch. I'll open client, click  Launch. It will stay grey 4-5 seconds. Then it seems like it is trying to go to the login screen, but simply disappears. Sometimes I will get the cannot connect to kernel popup.

That behavior is typical of a client dropping its connection to the login server before a solid link is established. I definitely recommend working through the connection guide I linked in my previous comment.

Let me know if that worked for you.
